::: {#hero-heading}

I am a psychometrician and R developer striving to improve educational outcomes for all students.
My research focuses on the application of diagnostic assessments to evaluate student proficiency and improve instructional decision making.
I write R packages to make complex psychometric models accessible to applied researchers and teach workshops on using R for data analysis.

[Learn more about me](/about){.about-links .subtitle}

:::
